Package jp.co.cam.universal.util.text.format.datetime

Interface DateTimeFormatIF

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractDateTimeFormat, DateTimeFormat, DateTimeFormat_DE, DateTimeFormat_DK, DateTimeFormat_JP, DateTimeFormat_SE, DateTimeFormat_US
public interface DateTimeFormatIF
[universal](commons)Provides datetime format conversion functionality.

    • setDateTime

      Date setDateTime(Date pmBaseDate, int pmDateYY, int pmDateMM, int pmDateDD, int pmTimeHH, int pmTimeMM, int pmTimeSS, int pmTimeMS)
      Set datetime.
      Parameters:
      pmBaseDate - base date
      pmDateYY - year
      pmDateMM - month
      pmDateDD - date
      pmTimeHH - hours
      pmTimeMM - minutes
      pmTimeSS - seconds
      pmTimeMS - millisecond
      Returns:
      new date

    • parse

      Date parse(String pmText, String pmTemp) throws ParseException
      Convert string to datetime. 
       [sample format]
 MMM/dd/yyyy
 dd/MMM/yyyy
 yyyy/MM/dd
      Parameters:
      pmText - string of datetime
      pmTemp - format
      Returns:
      java.util.Date
      Throws:
      ParseException - can't convertion data

    • parse

      Date parse(String pmText) throws ParseException
      Convert string to datetime. 
       [sample date format]
 (Recommended format)
 DD/MMM/YYYY
 DD-MMM-YYYY
 DD.MMM.YYYY
 MMM/DD/YYYY
 MMM-DD-YYYY
 MMM.DD.YYYY
 DD/MMM, YYYY
 MMM/DD, YYYY
 
 * The position of the day and month differs depending on the country.
 DD/MM/YYYY, MM/DD/YYYY, YYYY/MM/DD
 DD-MM-YYYY, MM-DD-YYYY, YYYY/MM/DD
 DD.MM.YYYY, MM.DD.YYYY, YYYY/MM/DD
 
 [sample time format]
 HH:MM:ss.SSS
 HH:MM:ss,SSS
      Parameters:
      pmText - string of datetime
      Returns:
      java.util.Date
      Throws:
      ParseException - can't convertion data
